name: Senior Associate to Data Analytics team
description:
A career within Consulting services, will provide you with the opportunity to help clients seize essential advantages by working alongside business leaders to solve their toughest problems and capture their greatest opportunities. We work with some of the world’s largest and most complex companies to understand their unique business issues and opportunities in an ever changing environment. We help create sustainable change by stimulating innovation, unlocking data possibilities, navigating risk and regulatory complexity, optimizing deals, and aligning costs with business strategy to create a competitive advantage.

Your responsibilities will include, but not limited to:

  • Design and prepare customer reports, dashboards and analyses; create prototypes; turn models into results
  • Analyze, validate and visualize business data, create value-added solutions
  • Analyze business questions and deliver business answers; translate technical data findings for non-technical teams and vice versa
  • Conducting dashboards in Power BI
  • Become a visualization expert to empower the clients understanding their data
  • Provide insights and recommendations for clients based on the analysis
  • Communications with the client on reporting needs
  • Conducting market research to understand key trends and develop recommendations
  • Development of PowerPoint slides on different topics


Knowledge and experience:

  • Bachelor’s/Master’s Degree in Economics/Finance with a strong IT attitude
  • 3+ years of working experience as Power BI specialist
  • Advanced knowledge of DAX language in Power BI
  • Advanced knowledge of Excel (Power Pivot/ Power Query)
  • Proven track record of building reports in Power BI/Tableau/Qlikview
  • Previous experience within consulting, banking and/or other industry sectors will be a plus
  • Knowledge of how to work with different types of data
  • Strong visualization skills
  • Excellent communication skills, ability to work closely to clients
  • Excellent time management skills, ability to work effectively with strict deadlines

During the interviewing process you will need to demonstrate the following skills:

  • General business understanding
  • Research skills
  • Strong problem solving skills
  • Ability to work with secure and sensitive data
  • Ability to work independently with minimum guidance from Senior colleagues
  • Ability to solve problem even with minimum knowledge in given sphere
  • Strong analytical and problem structuring skills
  • Commitment
  • Strong communication skills
  • Ability to work in multitasking environment
  • Availability for overtime work to meet tight deadlines
  • Stress-resistance
  • Willingness to undertake new and challenging tasks
